name: Little Lamb - a short visual novel
name_original: Little Lamb - a short visual novel
description:
Warning: This visual novel contains scenes of cartoon blood and may touch on subjects that could be potentially uncomfortable for certain individuals.  Please play at your own discretion.

________________________

Playtime: ~ 8 - 10 minutes (True Ending)

You find yourself in the middle of a forest talking to someone you don't know? A story reminiscent of Little Red Riding Hood although something has gone horribly wrong...

6 Endings: Can you find them all?

✰ BAD END 1/6: 'A Rocky Start' ✰

✰ BAD END 2/6: 'Cold Feet' ✰

✰ BAD END 3/6: 'Monster Under the Bed' ✰

✰ BAD END 4/6: 'A Losing Battle' ✰

✰ BAD END 5/6: 'Decisions...decisions...' ✰

✰ TRUE END 6/6: 'The Better to Eat You With' ✰

________________________

Hello! This is my first time coding and creating a visual novel! I went into this blind with a story I made up as I coded; sorry if it's a bit rough around the edges! This was a really fun experience and I hope to create something a bit more lighthearted next time!

CREDITS (also found in-game):

Art/Coding/Voice/Story: Pikachip
